---
id: set-log-filters

<Heading
  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/v1/logging/filters"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Validates and replaces all active log filters. Invalid filters are rejected entirely.
